pageContext.claim: “Global warming, no more wind, no more life. The oceans are going to rise. One eighth of an inch within the next 250 years we're going to be wiped out.”
pageContext.analysis: This is wrong. According to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, global sea level is currently increasing by about an eighth of an inch per year, not an eighth of an inch over the next 250 years.
